intro: Hartogia tabularis, commonly known as the flatleaf hartogia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Hartogia tabularis is often found in fynbos vegetation, contributing to the biodiversity of the region.
